snippet: Steiner NYC is buying and developing residential properties in New York, in part by using proceeds from the sale of a New Jersey office complex.
abstract: Steiner NYC is buying and developing residential properties in New York, part of a larger strategy to reposition its portfolio from suburban office buildings into multifamily properties.
lead_paragraph: Steiner NYC is buying and developing residential properties in New York, in part by using proceeds from the sale of a New Jersey office complex.

headline.seo: Steiner NYC Shifts From Suburban Offices to City Housing
headline.main: A Developer Makes a Shift From Offices in the Suburbs to City Housing
headline.print_headline: A Developer Makes a Shift From Offices in the Suburbs to City Housing
